InfoCommands(DiscordSocketClient, MuteService)

Commands for displaying information about various entities within the guild.

Declaration
public InfoCommands(DiscordSocketClient client, MuteService muteService)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client used for fetching information.
MuteService muteService

The mute service for fetching mute information.

Avatar(IGuildUser?)

Displays the avatar of a specified user or the command invoker. Has a button to view the guild avatar if available.

Declaration

[Aliases("Avatar")]
